CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing MegaMall Chain relative to Pop-Up Shops?
SRP.A: MegaMall Chain is {above} Pop-Up Shops in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Tech Gadget Hubs relative to Home Essentials?
SRP.A: Tech Gadget Hubs is {above} Home Essentials in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing MegaMall Chain relative to Home Essentials?
SRP.A: MegaMall Chain is {above} Home Essentials in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total in-store foot traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Pop-Up Shops}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total in-store foot traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Tech Gadget Hubs}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Tech Gadget Hubs's minimum In-Store Foot Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Tech Gadget Hubs's minimum In-Store Foot Traffic is in {2002}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Home Essentials's maximum In-Store Foot Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Home Essentials's maximum In-Store Foot Traffic is in {1988}.

NC.Q: Between 1988 and 1993, did the total In-Store Foot Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 1992 and 2012?
NC.A: The change in total in-store foot traffic between 1988 and 1993 was {smaller} than between 1992 and 2012.

NC.Q: Was the total In-Store Foot Traffic in 1990 higher or lower than in 2004?
NC.A: The total in-store foot traffic in 1990 was {lower} than in 2004.

NC.Q: Between 1988 and 2000, did the total In-Store Foot Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 2011 and 2015?
NC.A: The change in total in-store foot traffic between 1988 and 2000 was {smaller} than between 2011 and 2015.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2012, did the total In-Store Foot Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 1987 and 2006?
NC.A: The change in total in-store foot traffic between 1999 and 2012 was {larger} than between 1987 and 2006.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Pop-Up Shops} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Home Essentials and Tech Gadget Hubs first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Home Essentials and Tech Gadget Hubs did not exchange leading positions.
